source.name: WebhookSource
source.description: Receives data via webhook HTTP endpoint with buffered storage

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: Unique webhook endpoint ID (auto-generated UUID)

parameters.name: webhookSecret
parameters.description: Secret token for webhook authentication

parameters.name: payloadType
parameters.description: Expected payload format: json, html, or text (default: json)

parameters.name: payloadMapping
parameters.description: JSON mapping: {"title":"$.headline","text":"$.body","link":"$.url"}

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI provider for structured extraction from HTML/text payloads

parameters.name: bufferTTLDays
parameters.description: Days to keep processed webhook data (default: 30)

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Storage plugin for buffer table access

source.name: WebScraperSource
source.description: Fetches and extracts content from web pages with optional crawling

parameters.name: urls
parameters.description: Seed URLs to scrape

parameters.name: headless
parameters.description: Run browser in headless mode (default: true)

parameters.name: userAgent
parameters.description: Custom User-Agent string

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI provider for structured content extraction

parameters.name: objectTypeString
parameters.description: TypeScript interface for AI to map extracted data to

parameters.name: excludeTopics
parameters.description: Topics to exclude from extraction

parameters.name: crawlEnabled
parameters.description: Enable link-following from seed pages (default: false)

parameters.name: crawlLinkSelector
parameters.description: CSS selector for links to follow (default: "a")

parameters.name: crawlMaxPages
parameters.description: Max pages to scrape (default: 10)

parameters.name: crawlMaxDepth
parameters.description: Max link-following depth from seed pages (default: 1)

parameters.name: crawlSameDomain
parameters.description: Only follow same-domain links (default: true)

parameters.name: crawlAllowedPaths
parameters.description: Glob patterns for allowed URL paths (e.g., ["/blog/*"])

parameters.name: crawlExcludePaths
parameters.description: Glob patterns for excluded URL paths (e.g., ["/login", "/admin/*"])

parameters.name: crawlDelayMs
parameters.description: Delay between requests in milliseconds (default: 1000)

parameters.name: crawlRespectRobotsTxt
parameters.description: Respect robots.txt crawl rules (default: true)

parameters.name: botToken
parameters.description: Telegram bot token for authentication (self-hosted mode)

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: External connection ID (platform mode)

parameters.name: chatIds
parameters.description: List of Telegram chat IDs to monitor (self-hosted mode)

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: List of channel IDs to monitor (platform mode, same as chat IDs)

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Storage plugin for cursor management

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API key for Solana Analytics

parameters.name: tokenAddresses
parameters.description: Array of Solana token addresses to track

source.name: RSSSource
source.description: Fetches and processes RSS/Atom feeds with optional AI content extraction

parameters.name: feeds
parameters.description: Array of feed configs: [{url, cookieUrl?, excludeTopics?, objectTypeString?, type?}]

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI provider for structured content extraction from feed item pages

parameters.name: headless
parameters.description: Run browser in headless mode for cookie capture (default: true)

parameters.name: summaryUrl
parameters.description: URL for AI-generated summary JSON (latest)

parameters.name: historicalSummaryUrl
parameters.description: URL template for historical summaries (with date placeholders)

parameters.name: statsUrl
parameters.description: URL for stats data JSON endpoint

parameters.name: historicalStatsUrl
parameters.description: URL template for historical summary data (includes date placeholders)

parameters.name: githubCompany
parameters.description: GitHub company/organization name

parameters.name: githubRepo
parameters.description: GitHub repository name

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Repository URLs or "owner/repo" strings to track

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: GitHub App connection ID (for private repos)

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Operating mode: "raw" or "summarized" (default: "summarized")

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Fetch interval in seconds (for period labeling)

parameters.name: contributorsToExclude
parameters.description: Usernames to exclude (bots, etc.)

parameters.name: aiSummary
parameters.description: AI summary configuration { enabled: boolean, provider?: AiProvider }

parameters.name: activityTypes
parameters.description: Activity types to track (newPRs, newIssues, commits, comments, reviews, reviewComments, mergedPRs, closedIssues)

parameters.name: contributorsUrl
parameters.description: URL for contributors data JSON endpoint

parameters.name: summaryUrl
parameters.description: URL for summary data JSON endpoint

parameters.name: historicalSummaryUrl
parameters.description: URL template for historical summary data (includes date placeholders)

parameters.name: historicalContributorUrl
parameters.description: URL template for historical contributor data (includes date placeholders)

parameters.name: githubCompany
parameters.description: GitHub company/organization name

parameters.name: githubRepo
parameters.description: GitHub repository name

source.name: DiscordSource
source.description: Fetch messages from Discord channels with multiple modes

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Operating mode: detailed (full data), summarized (AI summaries), or simple (announcement channels only)

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: External connection ID (platform mode)

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: List of Discord channel IDs to monitor

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Storage plugin (required for detailed and summarized modes)

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI provider (required for summarized mode)

parameters.name: botToken
parameters.description: Discord bot token (self-hosted mode)

parameters.name: guildId
parameters.description: Discord guild/server ID (self-hosted mode)

parameters.name: mediaDownload
parameters.description: Media download configuration (detailed mode only)

parameters.name: botToken
parameters.description: Discord bot token for authentication (self-hosted mode)

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: External connection ID (platform mode)

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: List of Discord channel IDs to monitor

parameters.name: guildId
parameters.description: Discord guild/server ID (self-hosted mode)

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Storage plugin for cursor management

parameters.name: mediaDownload
parameters.description: Media download configuration

parameters.name: botToken
parameters.description: Discord bot token for authentication (self-hosted mode)

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: External connection ID (platform mode)

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: Array of Discord channel IDs to monitor

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Storage to store data fetching cursors

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Optional AI provider for content processing

parameters.name: botToken
parameters.description: Discord bot token for authentication (self-hosted mode)

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: External connection ID (platform mode)

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: Array of Discord channel IDs to monitor for announcements

parameters.name: tokenSymbols
parameters.description: Array of cryptocurrency symbols to track (e.g., ["bitcoin", "ethereum"])

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API key for Codex Analytics

parameters.name: tokenAddresses
parameters.description: Array of token addresses to track

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the API source

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: API endpoint URL

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API key for authentication

parameters.name: usePlatformAI
parameters.description: Use platform-hosted AI provider (Pro users get daily quota, free tier uses efficient model)

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: OpenRouter API key for authentication (not required if using platform AI)

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Model to use via OpenRouter (e.g., "anthropic/claude-3.7-sonnet", "openai/gpt-4o")

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: Temperature setting for model responses (0-2)

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: URL of the site using this provider (for OpenRouter analytics)

parameters.name: siteName
parameters.description: Name of the site using this provider (for OpenRouter analytics)

parameters.name: fallbackModel
parameters.description: Large context model to fallback to when token limits exceeded (e.g., "openrouter/sonoma-sky-alpha")

parameters.name: usePlatformAI
parameters.description: Use platform-hosted AI provider (Pro users get daily quota, free tier uses efficient model)

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: OpenAI API key for authentication (not required if using platform AI)

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: OpenAI model to use (e.g., "gpt-4o", "gpt-4o-mini")

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: Temperature setting for model responses (0-2)

parameters.name: fallbackModel
parameters.description: Fallback model to use when token limits exceeded

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI provider for summarization

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI provider to use for generating embeddings

parameters.name: minLength
parameters.description: Minimum text length to generate embeddings (default: 50)

parameters.name: batchSize
parameters.description: Maximum items per batch (default: 50)

parameters.name: skipExisting
parameters.description: Skip items that already have embeddings (default: true)

parameters.name: includeTitle
parameters.description: Include title in embedding text (default: true)

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI provider to use for topic extraction

parameters.name: maxTokens
parameters.description: Maximum number of tokens to use for topic extraction

parameters.name: thresholdLength
parameters.description: Minimum text length required for topic extraction (default: 300)

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI provider to use for image generation

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Storage Plugin to store the generated Daily Summary.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Specific source to generate the summary off.

parameters.name: outputPath
parameters.description: Location to store summary for md and json generation

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI Provider plugin for the generator to use to create the Daily Summary.

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Storage Plugin to store the generated Daily Summary.

parameters.name: summaryType
parameters.description: Type for summary to store in the database.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Specific source to generate the summary off.

parameters.name: outputPath
parameters.description: Location to store summary for md and json generation

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: AI Provider plugin for the generator to use to create the Daily Summary.

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: Storage Plugin to store the generated Daily Summary.

parameters.name: summaryType
parameters.description: Type for summary to store in the database.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Specific source to generate the summary off.

parameters.name: outputPath
parameters.description: Location to store summary for md and json generation

parameters.name: maxGroupsToSummarize
parameters.description: Max number of groups to generate summaries off ( Default 10 ).

parameters.name: groupBySourceType
parameters.description: Group by source type from storage, instead of topics generated from enriching.

parameters.name: mediaManifestPath
parameters.description: Path to media manifest JSON for CDN URL enrichment in summaries.

parameters.name: blockedTopics
parameters.description: Topics to exclude from summaries (default: ["open source"]).

parameters.name: skipFileOutput
parameters.description: Skip writing JSON/MD files to disk (for platform storage mode).

parameters.name: generateAfterHour
parameters.description: UTC hour (0-23) after which the daily summary is generated. Defaults to 20 (8 PM UTC). Set to 0 to generate immediately.

parameters.name: dbPath
parameters.description: Path to the SQLite database file

parameters.name: usePlatformStorage
parameters.description: Use platform-hosted PostgreSQL storage (Pro users only)

parameters.name: connectionString
parameters.description: PostgreSQL connection string (alternative to individual params)

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: PostgreSQL host

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: PostgreSQL port (default: 5432)

parameters.name: database
parameters.description: Database name

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Database user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Database password

parameters.name: skipValidation
parameters.description: Skip database connection validation (for testing only)
